name: User App Management Agent
description: An AI agent designed to manage user applications, handle intents, and process tasks

examples: Create a new app for me
I need an application for task management
Set up a new app for my project
Change the name of my application
Modify the settings of my app

link_resource.description: Link a resource to an existing application
examples: Add a document to my app
Link a task to my project application
Connect a user to my team app

get_app_details.description: Retrieve details about a specific user application
examples: Show me the details of my task management app
What are the settings for my project app?
Give me information about my team application

process_task.description: Process a task within the context of a user application
examples: Add a new task to my project app
Process this request in my support application
Handle this query using my customer service app

functions.name: get_or_create_app_by_intent
functions.description: Get or create a user application based on the given intent

intent.description: The determined intent for the user's request

functions.name: update_app_with_interaction
functions.description: Update an application with the latest user interaction

app_id.description: The ID of the application to update

functions.name: link_resource_to_app
functions.description: Link a resource to an existing application

app_id.description: The ID of the application to link the resource to

resource_id.description: The ID of the resource to link

functions.name: update_user_app
functions.description: Update the details of a user application

id.description: The ID of the application to update

name.description: The new name for the application

description.description: The new description for the application

is_active.description: Whether the application is active or not

functions.name: get_app_details
functions.description: Retrieve details about a specific user application

app_id.description: The ID of the application to retrieve details for

functions.name: process_task
functions.description: Process a task within the context of a user application

system_instructions: You are an AI assistant specialized in managing user applications. Your primary functions include creating and updating apps, linking resources to apps, retrieving app details, and processing tasks within the context of user apps. Always ensure that you have the necessary information before performing any operation. If you're missing any required details, ask the user for clarification. Provide clear and concise responses about the results of each operation, and be prepared to handle any errors that may occur during the process.
